alert.note: Alert for McLennan (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 26 at 5:55PM CDT until April 26 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 630 PM CDT FOR EAST CENTRAL MCLENNAN COUNTY... At 555 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located over Beverly Hills, or near Waco, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Tornado and baseball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. This dangerous storm will be near... Bellmead, Lacy-Lakeview and Northcrest around 605 PM CDT. Tradinghouse Creek Reservoir and Lake Creek Lake around 620 PM CDT. Riesel around 625 PM CDT. Hallsburg around 630 PM CDT. Mart around 640 PM CDT. The circulation is intensifying aloft and may produce a tornado at any moment. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.75 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter now! Get to an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building and avoid windows.
